definition: to issue (a document)/to sign and issue officially
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: If yes, by which the Quality System is issued?
sentences.chinese: 如有質量體系認證，是由何機構簽發？

sentences.english: Such documents that are issued by the carrier shall not be negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 承運人簽發的此類單證不得轉讓。
簽發和管理授權人員名單。

sentences.english: NVOCC is also a carrier because it can open B/L.
sentences.chinese: 無船承運人也是承運人因爲他可以簽發提單。

sentences.english: We hope you can show us the certificate issued by the Health Office.
sentences.chinese: 希望你方能提供已經檢疫所簽發的證書。

sentences.english: 5，The bailiff was in charge of issuing a summons on the defendant。
sentences.chinese: 法庭執行官負責向被告簽發傳票。

sentences.english: I would be happy to expedite and issue his U.S. visa myself.
sentences.chinese: 我本人將非常樂意加快簽發他的美國簽證。

sentences.english: Copies of a quota authorization and Import Permit issued by Minister of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 經貿部簽發的進口配額授權和許可證的複印件。

sentences.english: B. Is the countersigning of checks in advance prohibited?
sentences.chinese: 是否禁止連署簽發空白支票？

sentences.english: Arrest warrants are out for five other PD Notebook journalists.
sentences.chinese: 逮捕令簽發給了《PD手冊》的另外五名記者。

sentences.english: I have a health certificate issued by the Friendship Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 我有友誼醫院簽發的健康證。

sentences.english: The only difference between these two types is the addressee.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種類型之間的唯一區別是簽發人不同。

sentences.english: Therefore the company was unrepresented when the search warrant was applied for and issued.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在申請和簽發搜查證時，並無公司代表在。

sentences.english: He applied for judicial reiview by way of certiorari.
sentences.chinese: 他申請用簽發調卷令的方法獲得司法審查。

sentences.english: Most Americans have bank-issued credit cards.
sentences.chinese: 大多數美國人持有銀行簽發的信用卡。

sentences.english: As soon as the formalities had been got over, the consulate was quick to issue the work permit.
sentences.chinese: 正式手續一辦完，領事館就很快簽發了工作許可證。

definition: to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
